name: ai-career-assistant
description: AI Career Assistant - Resume + JD Analyzer with RAG

scripts.build: pnpm --filter @ai-career/shared build && pnpm --filter @ai-career/providers build && pnpm --filter @ai-career/configs build && pnpm --filter @ai-career/api build && pnpm --filter @ai-career/web build && pnpm --filter @ai-career/workers build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter @ai-career/api test && pnpm --filter @ai-career/shared test && pnpm --filter @ai-career/providers test
scripts.test:watch: pnpm --filter @ai-career/api test:watch && pnpm --filter @ai-career/shared test:watch && pnpm --filter @ai-career/providers test:watch
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter @ai-career/api typecheck && pnpm --filter @ai-career/web typecheck && pnpm --filter @ai-career/workers typecheck && pnpm --filter @ai-career/shared typecheck && pnpm --filter @ai-career/providers typecheck
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter @ai-career/api lint || true && pnpm --filter @ai-career/shared lint || true && pnpm --filter @ai-career/providers lint || true
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm --filter @ai-career/api lint:fix && pnpm --filter @ai-career/shared lint:fix && pnpm --filter @ai-career/providers lint:fix
scripts.docker:infra: docker compose up -d db redis minio minio-setup
scripts.docker:clean: docker compose down -v --remove-orphans && docker system prune -f
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter @ai-career/api clean && pnpm --filter @ai-career/web clean && pnpm --filter @ai-career/workers clean && pnpm --filter @ai-career/shared clean && pnpm --filter @ai-career/providers clean
scripts.clean:all: pnpm clean && rm -rf node_modules && pnpm docker:clean
scripts.setup: pnpm install:all && pnpm docker:infra && pnpm db:generate && pnpm db:migrate && pnpm seed
scripts.start:all: pnpm docker:infra && concurrently "pnpm start:api" "pnpm start:web" "pnpm start:workers"
